1.content: Pick the characters that gets tortured by abzorbaloff first
1.title: Abzorbaloff first victims

11.content:
“Urm, Bliss. It is Bliss isn’t it?” Victor asked
“Could I have a word with you in private please?” Victor exclaimed with a nervous look on his face.
“Of course you can yeah!” Bliss gleefully responded, the shining light of her happy, innocent face beaming over Victor’s shifty posture.
“Thank you” he then said with a slight smirk curling around his mouth.
The other members of the group looked back at her with slight concern but not enough to challenge Victor’s interaction with Bliss, besides, she can do what she wants. It's not our business they thought. When they all were ready as a group they huddled together in the lift and went up. Bliss looks back at them and exchanges a smile with the group.
Bliss was a smallish girl with long dark hair and a high pitch innocent tone which made her instantly likeable. Nobody could dislike Bliss, she was one of the few completely pure individuals who walk this earth. Though some who know her well may call her a bit naive.

Just as the last foot of her friends could be seen elevating out of sight Bliss turned around to face Victor who has been intently staring at her this whole time.
Bliss gives an awkward smile to Victor and says.
“So! What do you need me for?”
Victor pauses before he speaks.
“Oh. Just to ask you some questions I’m sure it won’t take that long, just take a seat there”.
Bliss happily sits down, her attitude still cheerful, she looks around the office and remarks on how much it has changed since Victor entered even though it’s only been a day. The days of hanging out with LINDA playing music and making art are over, I’ll miss those days she thought, but hey, the group now has a focus, and it’ll all continue after they are done finding the Doctor after all.
While Bliss was lost in her thoughts Victor was slowly walking around his new desk towards Bliss, his eyes latched onto her body, never looking away, barely even blinking.

“Are you okay Victor?” Bliss suddenly said.
“Oh, uh, yeah” Victor replied, knocked out of his fixation on the girl. When he spoke it sounded like he was holding back his breath, like he was anticipating something.
“Feel free to take your coat off Bliss” Victor said
“Sure” Bliss replied. She took her coat off and put it on the back of her seat, revealing the cute outfit she was wearing. When she looked back up she caught a glimpse of Victor’s stare, but as soon as she did that he looked away sharply.

Bliss had no idea what Victor was thinking, what horrific plans he had for her. How he wanted to stuff her inside of him while he feasts on her mind and body. He couldn’t wait to digest her and release her remains from his other end. He was so incredibly hungry And now there was a fresh victim literally walking alone right in front of him almost wanting to be absorbed.
11.title: Bliss

111.content:
While deep in thought Victor let out an inhuman stomach rumble, loud enough for Bliss to give him a concerned look.
“Haha, maybe you should have a bite to eat Victor. You sound famished” Bliss gleefully chuckled.
“Heha, I think I need more than just a bite Bliss, I think I need something larger” Victor chuckled back, Bliss was still smiling but a glint of worry flashed through her eyes, though it was quickly replaced back to her regular joyful expression.
“I’ll just head into the back to collect some documents, make yourself comfortable.
“Alright!” Bliss replied.
Victor walked off with an irregular skip in his step.
Victor is acting strange, she thought. Maybe she shouldn’t have stayed back by herself, her friends not close. Besides she hasn’t known Victor long, and coming to think of it she knows almost nothing about the man, lest that he wants to find the doctor and he has a strange skin condition. I’m sure it’s fine she thought dismissively, what could possibly happen?

Victor could feel butterflies in his stomach the anticipation was too much for him to handle, the last time he absorbed someone was that stupid waitress who walked in on him searching the internet for the Doctor. And her essence was quickly fading, providing little nourishment, or pleasure.
It won’t be long until he stuffs Bliss inside of him, his hunger being temporarily satiated.
Victor started to shed his human form.

*GRROOOOOAAN* *SLORRRP*
Bliss heard strange noises coming from the back room.
What is he doing in there? She thought
Another series of loud groaning and sloshing sounds emanate from the room now punctuated with moans.
Bewilderment now transformed to concern within Bliss and she stood up and called out to Victor.
“Are you okay in there Victor? What are you doing?”
“Oh nothing” Victor replied, his voice sounding different
“Relax everything will be fine” he said finally.

Bliss was anything but relaxed, something incredibly wrong was happening she could feel it, though she didn’t know what.
Before she had time to think the lights went off
Concern turning into panic and she shouted out
“What is happening!?”
She heard slow deliberate footsteps, though they sounded more like slapping sounds than normal human steps.
“Just relax Bliss, you’ll make this easier for both of us” a voice which sounded like Victor’s but changed slightly.
“What do you mean? Please don’t hurt me please” Bliss started to cry.

The lights turned back on and nothing in the world could have prepared Bliss for what she saw. A fat green thing stood at the other side of the room, wet gurgling sounds coming from its form. And it had a voice.
“I’m sorry Bliss but I know you won’t be very useful in any other way to me…”
Bliss cut him off.
“What the fuck are you” she screamed.
“This is my true form Bliss.” Victor replied calmly
“Trust me having to wear that skinsuit for hours on end is really confining. Unfortunate for you, you’re going to have to experience that soon. And oh god does it build up gas”
He released a monstrous fart
*PPPHHHAARRRP*
“What do you want, please don’t hurt me let me go.” Bliss said sobbing.
“Oh Bliss it’s okay I’m not going to kill you, that would be such an awful waste of that cute little body of yours. No you’re going to dissolve into me, giving me your whole being over to me so I can savour it. I reckon you’re going to taste amazing” Victor was slowly stepping towards Bliss while he was talking. Bliss was stepping back, trying to keep eye contact on him through her streaming tears.
Something triggered within Bliss and she tried to run. But Victor was already on her.
“Don’t try to fight this, you’ll only enter me tired”
“Get away from me!” Bliss shouted back. But it was no use. Victor had cornered Bliss in the small part of the room, there was nowhere she could go.
“Just relax, it’ll be okay” Victor cooed
Victor’s body started to make louder and louder squelching churning noises, almost as if it were anticipating Bliss’s form.
“Please” Bliss said, now almost a whisper, defeated.
“Be a good girl and take off your clothes, you won’t be needing them” Victor said calmly, but forcefully.
To his surprise Bliss started to undress. Was she usually this obedient? Or maybe she has just accepted defeat.
“That’s it girl”

Bliss stood in the corner completely naked. Victor's wet footsteps came closer and closer making slapping sounds as they did. His body was now making a cacophony of moans, gurgles and slick wet sounds.
Victor grumbed quietly as he got within arms length of her “mmmmmm you look delicious”
Bliss wasn’t talking, barely even making a noise apart from the odd whimper.
Victor trailed a fingernail across her belly up her chest past her medium size breast to her chin.
“This won’t hurt, just let it happen” Victor said.
“Mmm ok..” Bliss said but before she could finish Victor grabbed her hand. Her fingers and her forearm started to melt into him.
“Uhhhh AHHHH” Bliss shouted. It wasn’t painful, as Victor promised. But it was a sensation she’s never felt before, it was like she was being melted into a liquid and forced through a tiny hole.
Victor started to breath heavily through gritted teeth.
“Ohhhhh y-y-your good” he said.
Victor’s hand was now up to her elbow but he wanted more. He pulled whats left of her arm towards him, jerking her naked body forward so it was adjacent to his wet torso. Her breasts were the first thing to fuse to him, then her thighs, then her stomach. Victor wrapped his arms around her waist, heaving her inside of him.
“H-h-h ohhhhh yeesssss” he moaned.
Bliss screamed but Victor lifted up and arm and shoved her head into him. It hit his chest with a wet slap and then that started to be sucked deep within him.

Bliss’s body was now almost completely submerged beneath Victor’s skin, her legs being the only thing left but soon they sunk down and finally her feet entered him with a loud wet *POP*.
“MMM OHHHH MM OOOHHH YESS” Victor’s moans loudened as he could feel a whole human being within him. It was orgasmic.
Bliss’s body started to melt, the digestion letting out a massive *GLOORRRRP* from Victor’s backside.
All of a sudden Bliss was pulled out of him again, her face pushing out of Victor’s ass cheek
“H-H-H AA AA”
The sounds of gurgling and stretching echoed across the room which was recently used by Bliss and the rest of LINDA to have fun and enjoy themselves. Now only Victor was gaining any enjoyment, but the pleasure he felt was unimaginable, completely overpowering it almost made him collapse.
The stretching started to cease and her facial features started to form on Victor’s ass.
“It’s over now Bliss, you can rest” Victor said panting.
“W-w-where am I” Bliss bleakly whimpered.
“You’re mine now” Victor said.

Victor let out an almighty fart *PHHHRRRRP GLOORRRP FAARRRRRP* The stench rolled over Bliss. It was the smell of her own body.
Victor walked over to his desk where he sat down, squashing Bliss’s poor face down with a loud *SQUELCH*
He exhaled and let out another terrible fart and he moaned as he did it *MMMMMMPHHHRRRRP*

Over the next week Bliss barely ever saw light. She only saw it when Victor left his seat to go to the toilet where her face was planted on the toilet seat and Victor ejected more of her remains down below.
Bliss could access the things' thoughts, all she could feel was how much he enjoyed absorbing her, sucking all of her energy out of her and feasting on it.
Sometimes he tried to talk to her but she rarely spoke back.
She cried but nobody could hear her.
111.title: Continue

13.content:
“Mr Skinner!” Victor said Desperately

“We’re walking out” Skinner replied bluntly.

“Would you stay for a minute please. I’ve got numbers for Bridget, I’ve kept records, old numbers. We can track her down, you and I!” Victor said hopelessly, trying to make any excuse possible.

“That’s more like the old team spirit” Skinner said finally. Upon saying that Victor’s posture was visibly relaxed and he made a deep sultry exhale.

The other two members of the now much smaller LINDA looked back at him with respect in their eyes. They knew how much Skinner cared about Bridget and they hoped him and Victor could find her so Skinner could be close to his love finally.

“We hope you find her” Ursula said. Skinner gestured back at them thankingly.

As they walked away Victor beckoned Skinner closer to the desk.

“Just come a little closer. A bit more that's it.”

“So you got Bridget’s phone number, her email address, anything we can contact her with.” Skinner asked. Kennedy paused before he spoke and when he did it came out in a slow and sly manner.

“Yes, yes I do as a matter of fact. Just follow me into the back room, that's where I keep the records.”

Skinner nodded and followed Victor.

“You and Bridget have a thing going on between you don’t you” Victor chuckled.

“Why yes, uh how did you know” Skinner responded with a mixture of concern and joy on his face.

“Oh” Victor laughed. “She told me… well I say she told me. Lets just say I’m good at figuring out these kinds of things.”

“Oh well okay” Skinner replied awkwardly. “Well do you know where she could be?”

All of a sudden a low rumble came from Victor's stomach which caused him to clutch it tightly and make a strong sharp exhale.

“Are you alright Victor?” Skinner asked

“Oh yes” Victor replied “Just hungry, oh so very hungry, which is strange since it was only recently I’ve had some very large meals”. Skinner knew Victor was a strange man but as soon as he was alone with him he became even stranger; Victor also seemed like he was excited, there was a kind of skip to his step. “I’m sure it’s nothing,” he thought. “All I want to do is find out where Bridget has gone then I’ll be straight off to go and find her. And tell her how very much I want to spend the rest of my life with her.”

The two of them entered a side room from the main basement area. The room was basic and small, it had a filing cabinet on the far wall, a dusty table, some leather bags, some suits and a bed. A bed?? It looked used. Skinner considered asking Victor why this room looked lived in but he decided it was best to just get the contact details for Bridget then leave.

“Where am I looking Victor?” Skinner asked briskly

“Oh just look in that filing cabinet over there, I can’t remember which drawer they’re in so you’ll have to check each of them”.

“Umm okay then I guess” Skinner walked over and started opening the top drawer and searching through it for anything which looked like it could be contact details. All the files looked incredibly old, was this thing used?

Victor was staring at Skinner whe whole time, his gaze not leaving Skinner's back.

*GURGLE* *MOAN*

“Oh sorry about that Colin, any luck”

“None yet... are you sure... “

“Yes!” Victor replied intently

Skinner was now searching the third drawer and he was starting to lose hope before he had time to think Victor started talking.

“I can’t wait for you to find Bridget. *grunt* I’m sure you’ll see her very soon”

Skinner heard the door lock, his heart started to race.

“I don’t think it’s here” Skinner said shakily

“Keep looking forward” Victor said

“*PHHRRRTTT* Actually I think I might know where she is”

All of a sudden the room was bathed in a bright green light, a cacophony of moans and wet slick noises and a strange foul stench. Skinner looked over to Kennedy and saw him change, his suit was on the floor and his near naked body only covered with a loin cloth was changing in front of his eyes.

“WHAT IS GOING ON!?” Skinner shouted in horror.

With a loud squelch the light died down to reveal Victor, now a hideous thing with rolls of fat and twisted faces covering his skin.

“Look at me Skinner *FART* aren’t I the most exquisite being you’ve ever seen” Victor exclaimed.

“Wha-What are you” Skinner tried to be strong but his sentence came out a whisper.

“Does it matter” Victor replied “I am your end.

*MMMPPHHRRRTTTTTTT* followed by a moan and a whimper echoed around the room.

“Would you like to see where your dear Bridget is?”

Before Skinner had time to reply Victor walked towards him and turned round to reveal 2 sad faces grotesquely stretching out of his upper right back and his arse.

“I love you Colin” the first face said. It was Bridget. Colin fell to his knees, kneeling in front of this disgusting monster. Face to face with the other face, Bliss.

“I’m sorry Colin, we tried to warn you, but there is nothing we can do” Bliss admitted solemnly.

Skinner heard a rumble from deep inside Victor’s body, it got louder and louder until a long wet fart came out of his arse. Both Bliss and Skinner recoiled.

“Colin you are so special, I’ve never met anyone like you” Before Bridget could finish her monologue Victor butted in.

“I’m sure Skinner appreciates these kind words girls but quite frankly I’m ready for him to enter me and join you, make some space for him in there. Oh and Bridget I think you should thank me. You’ve always wanted to be close to Skinner and spend the rest of your life with him. Your wish is granted.”

Before any of the three had time to react Victor bent his knees and sat down onto Skinner squashing his legs with his bum and pushing his face adjacent to his back. Skinner felt his skin melting and merging with Victor’s.

“NOOOOO” the 2 girls moaned, though Bliss’s was muffled.

“OHHH YESS *GURRGGGLE* *MMMM*” Victor exclaimed in pure ecstasy.

Victor’s body continued to lower sucking more and more of Skinner into it. Each time a piece of Skinner entered the gurgles and wet noises increased in volume, as did Victor’s moans of pleasure.

After what seemed like hours but was only a minute Skinner was completely consumed.

The wet noises got louder yet again and the sound of stretching elastic sounded as an outline of Skinner’s face started to emerge onto his lower left stomach.

The two women already in Victor's body continued to moan, but to no avail.

Skinner’s face stretched out of Victor, it now fully formed and conscious.

“Where am I” Skinner said, confused.

“Mmmmm you were the best meal yet” Victor said. “Poor Bliss is going to have to smell all of your remains as I digest you”

*PHHHHUURUURRP*

"Oh Colin. I'm so sorry, I love you" Bridget said, but her voice was not of love but of sadness

"I'm sorry. We couldn't have known" Skinner replied

Victor got up, walked towards his desk, sat down and started to read his paper.

Waves of pleasure still washed over him from the sensation of having 3 victims now digesting within him.

Though he could always go for more.

Just as that thought entered his head. He heard the lift to the basement whirr into action.
13.title: Mr skinner

14.content:
"Oh, Oh Bridget, Bridget oh yes" Kennedy spluttered.
"Could I have a word with you in private please?".
"Mr Skinner is giving me a lift" Bridget replied sounding slightly confused.
"Oh I can drop you at the station I'm sure Mr Skinner won't mind will you?"
"Not at all" Skinner replied. Bridget and Skinner looked at each other, obvious affection in their eyes.
"Well, I'll, see you next week" Skinner asked nervously. "Alright then" Bridget said short of breath. The two leaned in for an awkward kiss, both with beaming smiles attached to their face.
Skinner proceeded to walk into the lift to join Elton and Ursula the other couple in the group, they too were smiling, chuckling to themselves watching the blooming relationship of the 2 others blossom.
"Bye Bye" Bridget said her smile not faltering. She watched her friends go up into the lift, already anticipating the next time they'll meet, and hoping she'll be able to spend some personal close time with Mr Skinner.

She looked back at Kennedy. Kennedy also seemed to be smiling but it seemed to come out as more of a smirk.
"So what did you need to talk to me about?" Bridget said, attempting to break the silence which was growing in the room.
"Oh nothing just some boring administrative stuff I need, nothing important" he said.
"Come over and take a seat at my desk I'll just go into the back and get the paperwork" before Bridget could say anything Kennedy waddled over to a side door into the room. He looked like he was rushing, he clutched his belly and let out a quiet yet audible fart.
He's acting weird. Bridget thought. She didn't think too much of it though, she knew Kennedy was strange and not quite adept at socialising, at least he offered to give her a lift to the station, that's sweet of him, though she didn't ever see him leave the basement or mention driving before.
Again Bridget started to think about Skinner, oh what times they'll have together, all she wanted was to be close to him. She couldn't wait to hang out as a couple with Skinner and the other two love birds, Elton and Ursula. Though its a shame Bliss left, Bliss was lovely she'd never consider she was the kind of person to just leave without proper notice, either way wherever she is right now she hoped Bliss was okay.
Mid thought Bridget heard incredibly loud strange sounds coming from the other room "MMMMMM" "PHHHHRRRTT" *MOAN*
"You alright Victor?" Bridget shouted to no reply

All of a sudden Bridget sensed how unsettled she felt, the last she saw of Bliss was when Kennedy asked to speak to her in private. "Surely n..." "MMMMMM" "PHRARRP" "GURGLE" and what sounded like muffled shouting could be heard again. Butterflies started to appear in her stomach. Something is wrong.
More noises again this time louder "MMMMPARP" "PPHHURRT" "MOAN", each noise punctuated with wet gurgling sounds, like wet clay being mashed. Bridget stood up. "What is going on!" she shouted, but the only reply was a quiet muffled voice which she swear sounded like Bliss. A door swung open in the dark of the other side of the room. A shape stepped out, each step it took made a wet slapping sound.
Bridget watched in horror as the thing came out from the dark into the light, it was Kennedy. He was near naked, fat and a kind of green and brown colour, what looked like twisted faces covered his body and the wet sound she heard before was now constantly emanating from him.
"finally I can show my true form to you Bridget, I've *PHHRRT* been waiting so long"
"W-w-what are you?" Bridget asked, fear clearly audible in her voice.
"This is what I truely look like, isn't my form beautiful *PHARRP*", After Kennedy's last disgusting wet fart he moaned. A voice which wasn't Bridget's or Kennedy's could be heard.
"I'm sorry, I'm so sorry Bridget there is nothing I can do. Run do something he wants to absorb you inside of him"
Kennedy was amused by Bliss's remark and he turned round to show Bridget what he's did to her. Bridget looked in both horror and sadness. Bliss's face could be seen plastered to the things arse, her face stretching out but slightly flattened, presumably because of when he sat down he squashed her. Kennedy let out another humiliating fart which wafted over Bliss's face her unable to avoid it, she grimaced and shut her eyes, a slight chuckle could be heard coming from Kennedy.
Bridget was locked in place, unable to move in shear shock of what was happening in front of her.
"Move Bridget!" Bliss said Kennedy still turned around to let the two speak "Just do something".
Bridget looked around the room. The lift was at the top, she wouldn't be able to get there in time. The stairs were locked. There were no other exits. What could she do?
"Nowhere to go Bridget, how about you just sit down and we'll let this happen slowly, painlessly. *MMPHRP* I'll put my hand on your hand and you'll quietly become one with me and your friend. What's even the point of fighting it anymore, you'll live the rest of your live peacefully sinking into me, none of the worries of the real world will exist anymore, just you, me your friends and ecstasy."
Bridget felt faint. She collapsed onto the floor completely overwhelmed with what was going on around her. She heard wet slapping coming closer to her.
"That's it Bridget *PPPHHRRP* don't struggle" Kennedy said calmly as he walked towards her. Bliss was sobbing.
Kennedy started to drool. "Dissolve into me, I'll make you feel amazing"
He took her clothes off. "You won't be needing these where you're going". Bridget looked up for one final time at Kennedy.. He grabbed her hands and lifted her up so she was facing him stood up. As their hands touched her hands felt liquidy and started to melt, Kennedy's skin greedily sucking her hand then wrists then arms into him.
"mmmmmmmm hhhhh aa" the thing moaned quietly at first but they started to get more intense as more of the woman entered the fleshy prison. The sounds of his skin slurping and sucking were deafening to Bridget's ears. Kennedy closed his eyes and grunted.
"I want all of you inside me" Bridget was up to her elbows inside Kennedy's hands at this point but it's obvious he was enjoying the process immensely. Kennedy pulled the rest of her body onto him a loud wet slap audible as their bodies collided. Bridget felt the whole of his torso on hers. The texture was slimy and squishy but before she could think it too hungrily feasted on her body, sucking it in at immense speed.
Bridget all of a sudden felt a wave of calm wash over her. "Why bother fighting" she thought and rested her tired head on Kennedy's chest. She could hear Kennedy's voice but now it was in her head "That's it come into me and let me gorge on you".
With a deafening wet *POP* and *SLURP* the last of Bridget's body entered Kennedy. Kennedy was now shaking with pleasure *PHHHAAAARRRRRRRPPP* The loudest of his farts yet could be heard to the audible disgust of Bliss who continued to sob as she could feel Kennedy's body shift inside to make space for its new occupant. Bliss could feel Bridget's calm and Bridget could feel Bliss's unhappiness.
Kennedy continued to shake and with a grunt and a gurgle a bulge on his upper right back started to form with the outline of Bridget's face. Kennedy was experiencing unimaginable pleasure as he felt Bridget join with him, the ecstasy of absorbing two people was incredible. He could feel everything they were feeling and everything they've ever felt, their memories, emotions, experiences, it was incredible.
Finally with a *SQUELCH* Bridget's face fully formed onto the things back. Stretching out.
"Bridget I'm so sorry" Bliss said but to no reply.
"It often takes time for people to adjust Bliss, give her time"
Kennedy walked over to his seat and sat down. Bliss let out a final squeal as with a *SQUELCH* her face was squashed back onto the seat.
"You tasted incredible Bridget. I can't wait to find out how your 'was to be' boyfriend will taste as soon as I can suck him into me.
Bridget let out a single tear knowing this was it now, she would spend the rest of her life attached to this awful being.
14.title: Bridget
